document_data.name: Ilthor
document_data.Activities: Ilthor sailed with her ship, the ''[[Windsinger]]'', around the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], in particular from [[Sembia]] to Aglarond.
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], [[Araevin Teshurr]]'s party boarded Ilthor's ship in order to arrive quickly in Aglarond.
